loans.name: Valentina

texts.en:
Valentina is a happy mother who has raised two children. They are now grown and live separately. Valentina is a successful entrepreneur from Kahovka, Kherson region in the south-east of Ukraine. She sells footwear in one of the local markets and she has been in this trade for 14 years. Economical crisis and high unemployment rates forced her to launch a small venture and to take the financial risks that come along with it. Valentina managed not only to survive in highly unfavorable surroundings but also to make her business sustainable. Currently, she has about 40,000 Grivnyas in stock. Her monthly net profit is little over 7,000 Grivnyas. 
	
Valentina says she is happy to be able to provide for her family and realize they have everything they need for normal life. Moreover, she enjoys working with people on a daily basis, learning to serve her customers better and getting more experience along the way. This time Valentina is requesting a 15,000 Gryvna loan to re-stock her inventory for the fall/winter season.

loans.use: To increase the merchandise assortment.

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es: Rosa Emilia tiene 43 años, su actividad económica es la venta de carne de res y pollo. Hace más de 4 años que tiene este negocio y está ubicado en su vivienda en donde asisten muchos clientes que compran este producto que es necesario. Tiene 2 hijos menores de edad que están a su cargo, ella es Madre responsable y por lo que se  siente muy feliz de realizar este medio de vida. Solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de carne para suplir la demanda de sus clientes. Por lo que sueña con lograr construir su propia vivienda para su familia.
texts.en: Rosa Emilia is 43 years old. Her economic activity is selling beef and chicken. She has had this business for more than four years and it is located in her house. Many customers go there to buy these necessary products. She is raising 2 minor children and is a responsible mother and is very happy in this lifestyle.  She is asking for the loan to invest in buying meat to meet the demand from her customers. She dreams of building her own house for her family.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Gabriela Valeria

texts.es:
Gabriela T. M. Valeria tiene 21 anos. Es soltera y vive con su mama y su hijo en el Cantón de San Pablo en la Provincia Bolívar. Su hijo tiene 5 anos. 

Gabriela es socia del grupo ¨Integracion Microempresarial¨ de San Pablo de Atenas. Son 14 socios en total, la mayoría que se dedican a diferentes actividades como comercio, negocios, y agricultores como fuente de ingreso a sus familias.

Gabriela tiene una tienda pequeña donde vende cosas como comida. Compra de los carros que traen cosas a San Pablo. 

Solicita el crédito para seguir aumentando las cosas que vende. Con el apoyo del préstamo le ayudaría en poder poner mas cosas en su tienda para vender. El préstamo le va a ayudar económicamente. Su sueno es seguir apoyando su hijo para que estudie.
texts.en:
Gabriela T. M. Valeria is 21 years old.  She is single and lives with her mother and her son in the Cantón de San Pablo in Bolívar province.  Her son is 5 years old.

Gabriela is a member of the "Integracion Microempresarial" ("Microenterprise Integration") group in San Pablo de Atenas.  There are 14 members total, most of whom engage in different activities like commerce, business, or agriculture in order to provide income for their families. 

Gabriela has a small store where she sells things like food.  She purchases from the trucks that bring things to San Pablo.

She is requesting this loan to continue increasing the items she sells.  The support of this loan will help her to be able to offer more things for sale at her store.  The loan will help her economically.  Her dream is to continue supporting her son so that he can go to school.

loans.use: to continue increasing the number of items she sells

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es:
Daniel vive en casa de sus padres en la zona de tembladerani, zona peri urbana de la ciudad de La Paz, es soltero; es empleado en una oficina, realizando trabajo de auditoria, con los ingresos que obtiene se mantiene; es la primera ves que presenta una solicitud de crédito para compra de materiales para pavimentar el patio de la casa.

Por su estudio socio económico califica para obtener un nuevo crédito.
texts.en:
Daniel lives in his parents' home in the Tembladerani zone on the outskirts of the city of La Paz. He is single and works in an office as an auditor. He supports himself with the income that he earns. This is the first time that he has applied for a loan. He will use the loan to buy materials to pave the patio of the house.

The socio-economic study has qualified him for a new loan.

loans.use: Buy sand, cement, and stone to pave the patio of his house

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes G. G. tiene 60 anos. Es casada y vive con sus hijos en el Cantón de San Pablo en la Provincia Bolívar. Tiene 4 hijos. 

Mercedes es socia del grupo ¨Integracion Microempresarial¨ de San Pablo de Atenas. Son 14 socios en total, la mayoría que se dedican a diferentes actividades como comercio, negocios, y agricultores como fuente de ingreso a sus familias.

Mercedes se dedica a criar chanchos, pollos, y cuyes. Vende sus cuyes en su casa. Después de engordar sus chanchos, se venden para las fiestas y los Domingos. 

Solicita el crédito para darles comida a sus chanchos y poner un chancearía. Con la ayuda del préstamo va a mejorar la vida de su esposo, ella, y su hijo. 

Su sueno es poder vivir mejor y seguir trabajando en la vida. 

El crédito de la Cooperativa San Jose le ayuda mucho
texts.en:
Mercedes G. G. is 60 years old. She is married and lives with her children in the canton of San Pablo in the province of Bolivar. She has 4 children.

Mercedes is a member of the group "Integracion Microempresarial" (Integrated Microbusinesses) in San Pablo de Atenas. There are 14 members in the group, and they work at different activities such as businesses, trades, and agriculture as a source of income for their families.

Mercedes' work is raising hogs, chickens, and guinea pigs. She sells the guinea pigs from her house. After fattening the hogs, she sells them for parties and Sundays.

She is applying for the loan to buy feed for her hogs and to set up a butcher's shop. With the help of the loan, she is going to improve her life and those of her husband and her son.

Her dream is to be able to live better and continue working in life.

The loan from the San Jose Cooperative helps her a lot.

loans.use: Feed her hogs and set up a butcher's shop.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria reside en vivienda propia en la zona de Alto Llojeta, ladera oeste de la ciudad de La Paz, esta casada y tiene una hija en edad escolar; ella es enfermera particular y esta cuidando a una persona de la tercera edad y su esposo es jubilado de la administración publica, con los ingresos que obtienen mantienen a su familia.

El crédito que saco anteriormente fue para la construcción de gradas en su vivienda, es cliente de Impro con 3 créditos. El crédito que ahora solcita será utilizado enla compra de cemento y arena para el piso de una terraza en su casa. La señora se encuentra satisfecha con los créditos que le otorgamos.

Por su antecedente histórico califica para obtener un nuevo crédito y se la considera buen cliente.
texts.en:
Maria lives in her own home in the Alto Llojeta zone on the west side of the city of La Paz. She is married and has a daughter who is of school age. Maria  is a private nurse and takes care of a senior citizen. Her husband is retired from public administration. She supports her family with the income that she earns.

Her previous loan was for the construction of steps in her house. She has had three loans from Impro. The loan that she is applying for now will be used to buy cement and sand for the floor of a terrace in her house. She is satisfied with the loans that she has been granted.

Because of her previous history, she is qualified to receive a new loan and is considered a good client.

loans.use: Buy cement and sand to make the floor of a terrace in her house.

loans.name: Gloria Ines

texts.es:
Gloria O. tiene 45 anos. Es soltera y vive con sus hijos en el Cantón de San Pablo en la Provincia Bolívar. Tiene 3 hijos: Gabriela de 19 anos, Verónica de 17 anos, y Wilson de 11 anos. 

Gloria es socia del grupo ¨Integracion Microempresarial¨ de San Pablo de Atenas. Son 14 socios en total, la mayoría que se dedican a diferentes actividades como comercio, negocios, y agricultores como fuente de ingreso a sus familias.

Gloria de dedica a trabajar en el campo sembrando maíz, y tambien cria ganados como fuente de ingreso a su familia. Hace las compras y las ventas de Ambato y vende en San Pablo. 

Solicita el credito para comprar semillas y pagar los peones para trabajar en el campo. 
Su sueno es comprar un carro. 

En su tiempo libre, realiza tejidos de ropa.
texts.en:
Gloria O. is 45. She is single and lives with her children in the Saint Pablo district in the Bolivar Province. She has three children: Gabriela, 19 years; Veronica, 17; and Wilson, 11. 

Gloria is a member of the group “Integracion Microempresarial” or ‘Microbusiness Integration.’ There are 14 members in total, and the majority work in sales, business, and agriculture as their source of income for their families. 

Gloria works in the field growing corn. She also raises livestock as a means of supporting her family. She makes her purchases and sales of the city of Ambato and sells in San Pablo. 

She requests the loan to purchase seeds and to pay the farm workers for their work in the field. 

Her dream is to purchase a car. 

In her free time, she weaves clothing.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and pay the farmworkers for working in the field

loans.name: Creciendo Hacia El Futuro 3 Group

texts.es:
Petronila es una de los miembros del Grupo Creciendo hacia el futuro , ellos son microempresarios dedicados a las ventas de ropa, productos naturales, zapatos, educacion,  etc; en la ciudad de San Pedro de Macoris, una ciudad famosa por sus jugadores de pelota y por la industria azucarera, su economía actual depende de la Zona franca, la industria del cemento y otras actividades menores como el turismo.  Está asociada  de Esperanza es madre de dos hijos y comenzó con nosotros porque tenía el sueño de tener una pequeña escuela en su comunidad, el cual inicio con su primer prestamo y actualmente llega 4 años y esta recibiendo su decimo prestamo, en cada uno ha realizado sus pagos satisfactoriamente y ha realizado buenas inversiones. Por medio de su negocio (Una escuela) da un buen aporte a su comunidad, ya que ofrece una buena educacion privada a un costo mensual bajo.

Petronila está planificando invertir su nuevo préstamo en la compra de utiles escolares para niños y productos para la cafeteria de la escuela. Ella va a utilizar sus ganancias para invertir en su negocio, comprando abanicos, hacer mas promociones, aunque actualmente tiene menos estudiantes por los problemas economicos de sus padres, su gran reto es poder pagarle a sus empleados, ya que en este periodo la escuela tendra menos ingresos. Su sueño ahora es poder tener mas alumnos, una mejor escuela, con mas profesores y al lograr esto podra apoyar a esas familias mas necesitadas, al menos desea apoyarle en su educacion.
texts.en:
Petronila is one of the members of the group Creciendo hacia el Futuro (Growing toward the Future). They are micro-business people who work in the sale of clothing, natural products, shoes, etc., and in education in the city of San Pedro de Macoris, a city famous for its ball players and for its sugar industry. Its present economy depends on the free-trade zone, the cement industry, and other lesser activities such as tourism. This member of Esperanza International is the mother of two children and began working with Esperanza International because she had the dream of having a little school in her community. She began the school with her first loan. Now it is four years later and she is receiving her tenth loan. For each loan she has made her payments in a satisfactory manner and she has made good investments. Through her business (the school) she makes a good contribution to the community, since she offers a good private education at a low monthly cost.

Petronila is planning to invest her new loan in the purchase of children's school supplies and products for the school cafeteria. She will use her earnings to invest in her business, buying fans and doing more advertising, although now she has fewer students because of the economic problems of their parents. Her greatest challenge is being able to pay her employees, since at this time the school has less income. Her dream is to have more students and a better school with more teachers, and when she achieves this she will be able to help the most needy families -- at the least, she wants to help them in their education.

loans.use: Buy school supplies and products for the cafeteria.

loans.name: Ranulfo Guillermo

texts.es:
Ranulfo Guillermo G. Q. tiene 46 anos. Es casado y vive en el Cantón de San Pablo en la Provincia Bolívar. Tiene 3 hijos de 18, 17, y 9 anos. 

Ranulfo es socio del grupo ¨Integracion Microempresarial¨ de San Pablo de Atenas. Son 14 socios en total, la mayoría que se dedican a diferentes actividades como comercio, negocios, y agricultores como fuente de ingreso a sus familias.

Ranulfo tiene un negocio de transporte y tambien trabaja en la agricultura. Vende sus cultivos a la semana en San Pablo. 

Solicita el credito para comprar los abonos y semillas para cultivar maíz, trigo, papas, frijoles, alverja, y mora. Su sueno es educar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Ranulfo Guillermo G. Q. is 46 years old.  He is married, lives in the San Pablo settlement in the Bolívar province, and has three children, ages 18, 17, and 9.  Ranulfo is a member of the “Integracion Microempresarial” group of San Pablo de Atenas.  The group is made up of 14 members, most of whom generate income for their families by being involved in different merchandising, businesses, and agriculture.

Ranulfo runs a transportation business and also works in agriculture.  He sells his harvests weekly in San Pablo.

He is asking for this loan so that he can invest in fertilizer and seed to grow corn, wheat, potatoes, beans, peas, and blackberries.  His dream is to be able to provide his children with an education.

loans.use: Fertilizer and seed

loans.name: Santos Hugo

texts.es:
Hugo P. Santos tiene 45 anos. Vive con su hermano en el Cantón de San Pablo en la Provincia Bolívar.

Hugo es socio del grupo ¨Integracion Microempresarial¨ de San Pablo de Atenas. Son 14 socios en total, la mayoría que se dedican a diferentes actividades como comercio, negocios, y agricultores como fuente de ingreso a sus familias.

Hugo se dedica a la agricultura como fuente de ingreso a su familia. Siembra maíz y arveja. Hace las compras de sus productos en el mercado de San Pablo y vende en San Pablo también. 

Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas. Con el apoyo del préstamo le ayudaria en incrementar mas los insumos y semillas. Su sueno es ahorrar dinero para una enfermedad que tiene. 

Le gusta asistir a los festivales de su comunidad y de todos los santos.
texts.en:
Hugo P. Santos is 45 years old and lives with his brother in the San Pablo hamlet of the Bolívar province.

Hugo is a member of the “Integracion Microempresarial” group of San Pablo de Atenas.  There are a total of 14 members, most of whom support their families through different types of merchandising, businesses, and agriculture.

Hugo relies on farming to generate income for his family.  He raises corn and peas.  He buys and sells products as the San Pablo marketplace.  He is asking for this loan in order to buy farming supplies.  This loan will give him the means to increase his supplies and seeds.  He dreams of being able to save up some money to treat an illness that he has.  He would also like to attend his community’s “all saints” festivals.

loans.use: Farming supplies

loans.name: Eliana Maricela

texts.es:
Eliana S. tiene 20 anos. Es casada y vive con su esposo en el Cantón de San Pablo en la Provincia Bolívar.

Eliana es socia del grupo ¨Integracion Microempresarial¨ de San Pablo de Atenas. Son 14 socios en total, la mayoría que se dedican a diferentes actividades como comercio, negocios, y agricultores como fuente de ingreso a sus familias.

Eliana se dedica a un negocio de ventas de helados, que ya tenido por los ultimos 2 anos. También hace recargas telefónicas. Hace las compras y ventas de sus productos en las tiendas de San Pablo. 

Solicita el crédito para avanzar en su negocio de vender helado y de hacer recargas de PORTA, una impresa telefonica. El credito le ayudaria en poder avanzar y hacer mas cosas en su negocio. 

Le gusta planificar las cosas que va a hacer en su negocio y hacer ejercicios.
texts.en:
Eliana S. is 20 years old.  She is married and lives with her husband in Cantón de San Pablo in Bolívar province.

Eliana is a member of the "Integracion Microempresarial" ("Microenterprise Integration") group in San Pablo de Atenas.  There are 14 members total, most of whom work in activities like commerce, business, or agriculture in order to provide income for their families.

For two years, Eliana has had a business selling ice creams and popsicles.  She also sells cell phone cards.  She buys and sells her products in the stores of San Pablo.

She is requesting this loan to advance her business of selling frozen desserts, as well as cell phone cards for PORTA, a phone company.  This loan will help her to advance and to offer more things in her business.

She likes exercising and planning what she will do with her business.

loans.use: to advance her business, which is selling frozen desserts and PORTA (a phone company) cell phone cards

loans.name: Galo Miguel

texts.es:
Galo Miguel V. N. tiene 23 anos. Es soltero y vive con sus papas en el Cantón de San Pablo en la Provincia Bolívar.

Galo es socio del grupo ¨Integracion Microempresarial¨ de San Pablo de Atenas. Son 14 socios en total, la mayoría que se dedican a diferentes actividades como comercio, negocios, y agricultores como fuente de ingreso a sus familias.

Galo se dedica a la agricultura. Siembra papas, choclo, y arveja. Hace las compras y las ventas de sus productos en San Pablo cada fin de semana. 

Solicita el crédito para seguir comprando y sembrando, incrementando poco a poco los productos que cultiva. Le gustaria cultivar avas en el futuro. Su sueno es comprar mas terreno para poder cultivar mas cultivos. Un desafío que se enfrenta a su trabajo es el clima que es muy variable y a veces no es bueno para sus cultivos. 

Le gusta jugar el boli y salir a bailar con amigos.
texts.en:
Galo Miguel V. N. is 23 years old. He is single and he lives with his parents in the city of San Pablo, in the province of Bolivar. 

Galo is a member of the group named "Small business integration" located in San Pablo Atenas. There are 14 members in the group and they all have different businesses activities to support their families. 

Galo is an agriculturist. He sows potatoes, corn, and peas. He makes his purchases and carries out the sale of his products in San Pablo on the weekends. 

He requests a loan to be able to keep purchasing and sowing his fields, increasing the quantities of products he harvests more and more. He would like to plant fava beans in the future. His dream is to purchase more land to have more plantations. The challenge that he faces is the changing weather that can sometimes be harmful to the harvest. 

He enjoys playing volleyball and going out to dance with friends.

loans.use: To invest in his plantations.

loans.name: Yelba Lilliam

texts.es: Selene De Los Andes tiene 35 años es madre soltera y tiene 1 hijo menor de edad a su cargo. Su actividad es la comercialización de muebles de mimbre y de madera, por lo que no es la primera vez que recurre a financiamientos para fortalecer su negocio. Ella siempre está buscando fuerzas para salir adelante y proporcionarles a sus hijos lo más necesario. Este negocio inicio por su hermana pues debido a las dificultades que atravesaba decidió que Selene administrara el negocio este crédito será para la compra de materia prima como materiales necesarios para la elaboración de sus productos, pues tiene varios pedidos.
texts.en: Selene De Los Andes is 35 years old and she is a single mom of a boy who is in her care. She has a business making and selling wicker furniture and it is not the first time she has accessed a loan to improve her business. She has always looked for support to come out ahead and to support her child as much as possible. She started this business with her sister's help. With the difficult times she was going through she decided that Selene would be the administrator of the business. This loan will be used to purchase materials necessary for the creation of her products. She has various orders that still need to be filled.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Aracelly Patricia

texts.es: La Sra. Aracely vive en casa alquiler,  es casada tiene tres hijos jóvenes,   la cliente es una persona muy trabajadora, dedica mucho tiempo a su negocio, donde tiene colaboración de su esposo, también sus hijos. Su actividad económica es la elaboración y venta  de comida: almuerzos familiares y en la noche cena, tiene bastantes clientes que le compran de la zona, también  tiene contratos de atenciones para acontecimientos sociales, donde se encarga de toda la gastronomía. Solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos por mayor, debido a la inflación de los productos como la papa, arroz azúcar y otros. No esta teniendo mucho margen de ganancia, por lo que solicita a la institución un crédito para poder comprar  sus productos.
texts.en: Aracelly rents her home. She is married and she has three young children. She is a very hard working person who dedicates a great deal of time on her business. She runs the business together with her husband and her childre. She makes and sells prepared foods: family style lunches and in the evenings she serves dinner items. She has a significant client base that buy her products in the region, but she also has contracts with social groups and organizations where she manages the catering. She requests a loan to purchase ingredients in wholesale, such as potatoes, rice, sugar etc. Her profit margin is not very large which is why she requests a loan, to purchase more products.

loans.use: To purchase ingredients.

loans.name: Los Amigos Group

texts.es:
el grupo Los Amigos viven en la aldea La Flor de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, esta formado por tres miembros dos hombres y una mujer, a continuacion se detallan las diferentes actividades que ellos realizan:
 
la señora Valentina M. V. tiene 47 años de edad y se dedica al negocio de pulperia en la cual vende abarroteria en general, jabon, carnes, embutidos, lacteos, refrescos  etc. su negocio esta ubicado en su cada de habitacion, el credito lo utilizara para comprar mas mercaderia y asi tener mas surtida su pulperia. las ganancias las necesita para cubrir con los gastos del hogar.

el señor Mario Reinell A. es soltero y tiene  36 años de edad, tiene una pequeña pulperia en su casa de habitacion, con este negocio sale adelante, el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia.

el señor Santos Agustin García es soltero y se dedica a la fabricacion y venta de ladrillos en su casa de habitacion, Santos vende ladrillo rafon y tejas.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de tierra, barro y para la reparacion del horno donde procesa sus productos.
texts.en:
The members of the group named Los Amigos live in the district of La Flor in the city of San Lorenzo. It is make up of three members, two men and a woman. Here following are the details of the different businesses they carry out: 

Valentina M. V. is 47 years old and she has a grocery store from where she sells general grocery items, such as soap, meats, canned goods, milk products, soft drinks etc. Her business is located in a section of her home. The loan will be used to purchase more merchandise to restock her store. She needs the profits to cover the household expenses. 

Mario Reinell A. is single, he is 36 years old, and he has a small grocery store in a section of his home. He is able to support himself through this business. He will use this loan to purchase more merchandise. 

Santos Agustin G. is single; he makes and sells bricks where he lives. Sandos sells construction bricks and roofing tiles. The loan will be used to purchase sand and clay to repair the oven where he makes his products.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Yelba Liliam

texts.es: La señora Yelba Lilliam tiene 39 años, es madre soltera y tiene dos hijos ya mayores de edad. La señora se dedica a la venta de banano en el mercado oriental, utiliza como bodega su casa de habitación, este negocio lo tiene desde hace seis años, aunque principalmente inicio como una herencia familiar, ya que en principio quien lo tenía era su papa. Al fallecer fue su mama la que quedo a cargo. Cabe señalarse sus hermanos también se dedican a este negocio. El problema principal que enfrenta la señora es cuando escasea el banano, lo que hace que el precio se incremente. Ella desea utilizar este préstamo con el propósito de comprar más inventario y de esta manera vender más y ganar más. Su sueño es realizar la compra de una unidad de acarreo un camión para bajar los costos de transporte del negocio y obtener más rentabilidad.
texts.en: Yelba Lilliam is 39 years old, she is a single mother and she has two grown children. She sells bananas in the Oriental market. She uses her home as a warehouse. She has had this business for the past six years although at first she started out with a family inheritance. It was originally her father's business. When he passed away it was her mother that was left in charge. It should be noted that her siblings also tend to the same type of business. The biggest challenge she faces is when the banana harvests are poor, driving the prices up. She wishes to use this loan as a deposit to purchase more inventory so to improve her sales and her profits. Her dream to purchase larger quantities of product, to lower transportation costs, and improve her profits.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Cludia Yojana

texts.es:
la sra. Claudia Yojana D. tiene 27 años de edad, es madre de una hija.
Claudia se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa desde el año 2007 a la fecha, Claudia vende ropa para niños y adultos en los barrios y colonias de San Lorenzo de casa en casa y con clientes que trabajan en empresas de la localidad, tambien viaja a la ciudad de Choluteca a realizar ventas  a algunos familiares.

Claudia no tiene casa propia alquila y su mayor deseo es tener su propia casa.
 
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de ropa, tiene muchos clientes que le estan haciendo varios pedidos y no tiene capital para comprar mas ropa.
texts.en:
Claudia Yojana D. is 27 years old and she is the mother a girl. Claudia has been buying and selling clothes since 2007. Claudia sells kids and adults' clothing in the districts and colonies in San Lorenzo, going from door to door and selling to clients that work in the various companies in the region. She also travels to the city of Choluteca to make sales to some family members. 

Claudia does not have her own home, she rents. Her greatest dream is to have a home of her own. 

The loan will be used to purchase clothing. She has a large client base and there are many orders that have been placed but she does not have the capital to purchase more clothing.

loans.use: To purchase clothing.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Damian

texts.es:
el señor Damian L. tiene 50 años de edad, es casado y tiene 4 hijos que dependen de el, dos de ellos le ayudan en su taller.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de herramientas para su taller ya que dia con dia se le dañan o se 
extravian las herramientas.
Esta actividad de mecanica la realiza desde hace 18 años, no tiene casa propia ya que le ha sido dificil construirla. 
 
su mayor sueño es poder un dia tener su propia casa.
texts.en:
Damian L. is 50 years old, he is married and he has 4 children that depend on him. Two of his children assist him in his shop.

The loan will be used to purchase tools for his shop. Day after day the tools wear out or they get lost. 

He has been a mechanic for the last 18 years. He doesn't have a house of his own. He has found it difficult to build it. 

His greatest dream is to have a house of his own one day.

loans.use: To purchase tools.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Adiact Antonio

texts.es: Adiact Antonio tiene 28 años, su actividad es brindar el servicio de disco móvil. Hace más de 8 años que se dedica a este negocio,  por lo que es un hombre muy trabajadora se preocupa por su familia y está pendiente de lo que ellos necesitan. Sus inicios fueron por la búsqueda de ingresos, pues a él siempre le ha gustado la música ya que también tenía conocimientos de muchos programas que se utilizan para realizar este tipo de negocios. El financiamiento es para la compra de materia prima como mobiliario y equipos.
texts.en: Adiact Antonio is 28 years old. His activity is offering amobile DJ service. He has had this business for more than 8 years. He is a very hard working man who worries about his family and is always keeping track about what they need. He began by seeking more income. He always liked music and he also knew a lot of programs used to do this type of work. The loan is to buy materials for the mobile unit and equipment.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Etelvina

texts.es:
la sra. Etelvina Mejia tiene 58 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene dependientes, tiene 3 hermosos nietos.
doña Etelvina es una mujer sola que se ha dedicado siempre al comercio, tiene una pequeña pulperia en su casa de habitacion.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria y refrescos logrando de esta manera surtir un poco mas su negocio y por ende tener mejores utilidades.
su mayor deseo es que la economia del pais se mejore para asi lograr tener mejores ventas.
texts.en:
Mrs. Etelvina Mejia is 58 years old. She is single and has no dependents. She has 3 beautiful grandchildren. Etelvina is a woman on her own who has always worked as a merchant. She has a small convenience store in her house.  

She will use the loan to buy grocery products and beverages to supply her business a little more and thus have more profit. Her greatest wish is for the country's economy to improve so that she can have more sales.

loans.use: To buy beverages, water, toilet paper, rice, beans, bread, lard, eggs, margarine, batteries, candles, matches, oil, churros, condiments, salt and canned product.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Noé

texts.es: Noé T. R. de 27 años de edad, es un joven muy trabajadora, el cual reside en San Juan Opico, ubicado en el departamento de La Libertad, en donde vive junto a su esposa y dos hijos de 1 y 3 años de edad. Noé se dedica a trabajar como agricultor en una parcela, en la cual también vive junto a su familia. En su terreno él siembra: maíz, frijoles y maicillo, los cuales posteriormente comercializa con sus clientes quienes por años han consumidos los granos básicos que Noé cultiva. Con el fin de poder brindarle una vida mejor a su esposa, quien es ama de casa y se dedica a cuidar a los niños, Noé también trabaja como electricista, lo que le permite contar con ganancias extras. Noé solicita un préstamo a Integral por medio del cual pueda contar con la cantidad de dinero necesaria para invertir en la compra de granos básicos y así mismo abono y otros recursos más los cuales son necesarios para desempeñar un mejor trabajo.
texts.en: Noé T. R. is 27 years old. He is a very hard working young man who lives in San Juan Opico, located in the La Libertad department. He lives there with his wife and two children, aged 1 and 3. Noé works as a farmer on a land parcel, where he lives with his family. He plants corn, bean and maicillo, which he later sells to customers who have consumed the grains tha Noé grows. In order to offer a better life to his wife, who is a housewife and takes care of the children, Noé also works as an electrician. This allows him to have extra income. Noé is asking for a loan from Integral to be able to have enough money to invest in buying basic grains and fertilizer and other resources necessary to do a better job.

loans.use: To buy seed for planting

location.town: San Juan Opico, departamento de La Libertad

loans.name: Moises

texts.es:
El Señor Moisés P. M. tiene 27 años, el está separado de su esposa  y es padre de tres hijos a los cuales ayuda y apoya en su educación, el trabaja en el magisterio como profesor de primaria, él también trabaja como moto taxista  en el sindicato “EL SAYUBU” en la localidad de Puerto Villarroel en el trópico de la ciudad de Cochabamba,  en el cual esta hace mas de 10 años como socio activo, el servicio que brinda es rentable por la alta cantidad de personas que solicitan este servicio por la facilidad,  rapidez y eficiencia. El sindicato cuenta con paradas y turnos para cada afiliado, en diferentes puntos de la localidad de Ivirgarzama donde las personas acuden para solicitar dicho servicio.

Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un préstamo de nuestra institución cuyo destino será la compra de una nueva motocicleta, debido a que la que tiene actualmente ya cumplió su ciclo de trabajo y de esta forma poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le permitirá también mejorar sus ingresos consecuente mente mejorar su calidad de vida.

Cabe señalar que el señor Moisés P. M. se apersono a CIDRE a solicitar su préstamo luego de que sus compañeros de trabajo le comentaron de las buenas condiciones crediticias con las que trabaja nuestra institución.
texts.en:
Moisés P. M., age 27, is separated from his wife.  He has three children who he helps, and he supports their education.  He works as an elementary school teacher.  

He also works as a “moto taxi” (three wheeled motorized vehicle) driver for the El Sayubu syndicate.  He drives his taxi in Cochabamba’s Trópico area in Puerto Villaroel.  He has been an active member of the syndicate for over ten years.  The taxi service is profitable because many people use it for its ease, speed, and efficiency. The union has stops and shifts for each member at different points in the town of Ivirgarzama, where people use the taxi service.

This is his first loan with our institution.  He will use the loan to buy a new motorcycle.  His motorcycle has finished its useful life.  With the new one he will be able to provide better service to his customers.  This will allow him to improve his income, which will consequentially improve his quality of life.

Moisés P. M. came in person to CIDRE's offices to ask for a loan after his coworkers told him of the institution's good credit conditions.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
El Señor Luis Alberto M. C. tiene 37 años, el vive en concubinato  y es padre de 5 hijos a los cuales ayuda y apoya en su educación, él desde muy joven tubo su familia a las cual sustenta con diferentes trabajos a los cuales el se dedica, el es pescador, agricultor y él también trabaja como moto taxista  en el sindicato “EL SAYUBU” en la localidad de Puerto Villarroel en el trópico de Cochabamba,  en el cual esta hace mas de 10 años como socio activo, el servicio que brinda es rentable por la alta cantidad de personas que solicitan este servicio por la facilidad,  rapidez y eficiencia. El sindicato cuenta con paradas y turnos para cada afiliado, en diferentes puntos de la localidad de Ivirgarzama donde las personas acuden para solicitar dicho servicio.

Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un préstamo de nuestra institución cuyo destino será la compra de una nueva motocicleta, debido a que la que tiene actualmente ya cumplió su ciclo de trabajo y de esta forma poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le permitirá también mejorar sus ingresos consecuente mente mejorar su calidad de vida.

 Cabe señalar que el Luis Alberto M. C. se apersono a CIDRE a solicitar su préstamo luego de que sus compañeros de trabajo le comentaron de las buenas condiciones crediticias con las que trabaja nuestra institución.
texts.en:
Luis Alberto M. C., age 37, is in a common-law marriage.  He has five children who he helps and supports in their education.  Since he was young he had to support his family with different jobs.  He is a fisherman, a farmer, and a  “moto taxi” (three wheeled motorized vehicle) driver for the El Sayubu syndicate. 

He drives his taxi in Cochabamba’s Trópico area in Puerto Villaroel.  He has been an active member of the syndicate for over ten years.  The taxi service is profitable because many people use it for its ease, speed, and efficiency. The union has stops and shifts for each member at different points in the town of Ivirgarzama, where people use the taxi service.

This is his first loan with our institution.  He will use the loan to buy a new motorcycle.  His motorcycle has finished its useful life.  With the new one he will be able to provide better service to his customers.  This will allow him to improve his income, which will consequentially improve his quality of life.

Luis Alberto M. C. came in person to CIDRE's offices to ask for a loan after his coworkers told him of the institution's good credit conditions.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Nataly

texts.es:
La  señora Nataly D. tiene 25 años de edad y vive en la casa de una familiar en el barrio Villa Fatima de la ciudad de Tarija. Nataly no es casada pero tiene un hijo. Nataly se dedica a trabajar como operadora de radio en un sindicato de taxistas desde hace más de 2 años.                       
                                                                                                                  Nataly quiere tener mejores ingresos para brindarle una mejor vida a su familia pero ella nos cuenta que tiene un terreno que es de propiedad de su padre y tiene la necesidad de comprar plantines de uva para poder cosechar y vender la misma. Es por eso que el crédito será destinado para la compra de dichos plantines para de ese modo poder incrementar sus ingresos.  
                                                                                                                  Nataly  nos cuenta que quiere darle a su hijo toda la comodidad que pueda, por eso nos dice que el próximo crédito que solicite será para mejorar las condiciones de la casa donde vive.
texts.en:
Nataly is 25 years old and lives in the home of a family member in the barrio of Villa Fatima in the city of Tarija.  She is not married but she has a son. Nataly has worked for more than 2 years as a radio operator for a taxi drivers union.

Nataly wants to improve her income in order to offer her family a better life, and she tells us that she has a piece of land that belongs to her father and she needs to buy plantings of grapes to be able to harvest and sell them.  For that reason, this loan will be destined to purchase these plantings so that in this way, she can increase her income.

Nataly also says that she wants to offer her son all the comfort she can. That's why her plan for the next loan she requests will be to improve the condition of the house where she lives.

loans.use: BUYING PLANTINGS OF GRAPES TO HARVEST AND SELL

loans.name: Triumphant Women! Group

texts.es:
El grupo Mujeres Triunfadoras,  fue llamado así porque esperan tener éxito y prosperar en sus negocios, todas son amigas y se conocen entre sí, se formó en el Estado de México.

La señora Ma. Guadalupe M., es soltera  tiene 4 hijos ella estudio hasta la secundaria, se dedica a hacer costuras de todo tipo desde vestidos muy elaborados hasta la costura más sencilla, ella menciona que con su trabajo ha sacado  adelante a sus hijos los cuales todos están en edad  escolar, así mismo pretende continuar haciendo costuras para que sus hijos lleguen ha ser profesionistas.

La señora María R.,  es casada con el señor Miguel Sánchez, él es campesino no tienen hijos, y ella tiene un taller de costuras en donde hace suéteres, los vende por mayoreo y menudeo, menciona que cuando su esposo no trabaja, ya que tienen tierras de temporal, ella se siente orgullosa por aportar a la economía de la casa, así mismo pretende seguir trabajando y así asegurar un futuro prospero con su esposo.
texts.en:
The group was named ‘Triumphant Women » because they all hope to be successful and to prosper their businesses. The members all know each other and are friends. The group was formed in the state of Mexico. Mrs. Guadalupe M. is single and she has 4 children. She completed high school and now she is a seamstress, making all types of dresses, from very ornate to the very simple. She says that her work has granted her the ability to support her children, all of whom are school aged. She plans on continuing on with her sewing so that her children will grow up to have a career. 

Mrs. Maria R. is married with Miguel S., a farmer, and they have no children.  She has a seamstress shop where she makes sweaters that she sells in wholesale and in retail. She says that when her husband is not working, his harvests are seasonal, she feels very proud to be in charge of the household economy. She plans on continuing on with her work to secure a prosperous future for herself and her husband.

loans.use: To invest in their businesses.

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es: La señora María Mercedes tiene 30 años, ella es casada,  y tiene dos menores de edad a su cargo. Maria se tiene su negocio que es la venta de mercadería en general, cabe señalar tiene ocho años de tener este negocio y también posee una clientela ya establecida en su comarca. La mayoría de sus ventas son al contado, sin embargo también realiza ventas a crédito. Este negocio nació por la necesidad de incrementar los ingresos familiares, para mejorar económicamente. Ella desea invertir este crédito en la compra de camisas, faldas, cosméticos, toallas, sabanas y calzado. El préstamo mejorara sus ganancias. Su sueño es tener otro medio de ingreso para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Mercedes is 30 years old, married, and has two youngsters under her care. María’s business is selling general merchandise and it is worth noting that she has had this business for eight years and has an established customer base in her area. The majority of her sales are paid for in cash, but she also makes sales on credit. This business was born out of the necessity to increase family earnings to improve financially.

María wants to invest this loan in the purchase of shirts, skirts, cosmetics, towels, sheets and shoes, which will improve her earnings. Her dream is to have another form of income to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Juana Bertha

texts.es:
la señora Juana Bertha M. tiene 50 años de edad, es soltera y tiene una hija, Juana se dedica al comercio desde hace dos años, anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de verduras y otras cosas.
doña juana es una mujer seria, sencilla y honesta en sus compromisos.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de zapatos, sandalias y ropa de dama y caballero.
doña Juana vive en el barrio La Ceiba de la ciudad de Nacaome.
su pasatiempo es hacer manteles, los borda con hilo de colores y le quedan muy bonitos.
texts.en:
Juana Bertha M. is 50 years old, she is single and she has a daughter. Juana has had her business for the past two years. Previously she sold vegetables and other merchandise.

Juana is formal, simple woman who is honest with her commitments. The loan will be used to purchase shoes, sandals and ladies' and gentlemen's clothing. Juana lives in the district of La Ceiba in the city of Nacaome.  

Her past-time is making tablecloths. She embroiders them using colors of various colors, making the final product very beautiful.

loans.use: To purchase shoes and clothing.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Karla Vanesa

texts.es: La señora Karla tiene 38 años, ella es casada  y tiene 2 hijos menores de edad. La señora se dedica a la venta de tortillas, ella busca la forma de sacar adelante a su familia y es por medio de este humilde negocio que lo ha logrado. Ella dio inicio a este negocio desde hace 10 años, cabe señalarse fue su Mama quien le enseño este negocio, el cual surgió como una necesidad de búsqueda de empleo. Ella está solicitando este crédito con el objetivo de invertirlo en la compra de maíz, cal, bolsas, entre otras cosas necesarias. Su sueño es lograr finalizar sus estudios universitarios pues está buscando la forma de salir adelante.
texts.en: Karla is 38 years old, she is married and she has 2 small children. She sells tortillas for a business. She is always in search of ways to provide for her family and it is through this humble business that she has attained her goal. She started her business 10 years ago and it was her mother that taught her the business.  The necessity to establish the business arose when she saw the need for work. She requests a loan with the plan of investing the funds in the purchase of corn, lime, bags and other necessary items. Her dream is to complete her university studies and to find a better way to succeed in life.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Vicky Jicela

texts.es:
la señora Vicky Jisela A. C. tiene 26 años de edad, tiene una hija y esta casada.
ella y su esposo se dedican al comercio, Vicky cuenta con un pequeño comedor en el cual ofrece desayunos, almuerzos, cenas y otro tipo de golosinas como ser: tamales, emparedados, enchiladas. sus clientes son vendedores de empresas,
personas que trabajan cerca de la zona y con los familiares.
ademas vende refrescos, agua en botellon y jugos naturales.
 
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de verduras, carnes de res, cerdo y pollo, refrescos, condimentos y gas.

su mayor sueño es construir su casa ya que vive en la casa de su suegra.
texts.en:
Vicky Jisela A. C. is 26 years old, she has a daughter and she is married. She and her husband are business partners. Vicky has a small restaurant from where she serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner and she also caters snacks such as: tamales, sandwiches, and enchiladas. Her clients are the salespeople and other workers that are in the region, and her family.  She also sells soft drinks, bottled water and fresh juices.

The loan will be used to purchase vegetables, beef, pork and chicken, soft drinks, condiments and fuel gas.

Her greatest dream is to build a house. They currently live with her mother-in-law.

loans.use: To purchase ingredients.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Eulalio

texts.es:
Eulalio de 55 años es soltero, trabaja para como Vigilante en la Alcaldia de Juigalpa desde hace 8 meses. 

Esta solicitando  su 2do credito con el objetivo de levantar los arranques de su casita pues actualmente no cuenta con su propia vivienda y desea brindarle a su familia la oportunidad de tenerla, pues es el patrimonio que dejara a sus hijos cuando falte. 

Su mayor sueño es que sus hijos estudien y sean hombres de bien y que saquen adelante a nuestro pais.
texts.en:
Eulalio is 55 years old and single.  He has worked as a watchman for the city of Juigalpa for eight months.

He is requesting his second loan in order to start his house.  He does not currently have his own house, and he wants to give his family the opportunity to have one.  It is the inheritance that he will leave for his children.

His greatest dream is for his children to be educated and that they will become good men who will get our country ahead.

loans.use: To start his house

loans.name: Bernarda

texts.es:
la señora Bernarda R. es una mujer soltera y no tiene hijos que dependan de ella, vive en casa de sus padres y se dedica a la venta de churros, manteca, huevos, agua, café, azucar, refrescos.
Bernarda vive en el barrio Las Brisas de Nacaome, doña Bernarda es una persona bien callada no le gusta conversar mucho, es muy responsable.
el credito lo utilizara para comprar mas mercaderia y agua para surtir su pulperia. 
su deseo es que toda su familia tengan buena salud.
texts.en:
Bernarda R. is a single woman with no children who depend on her.  She lives with her parents and sells churros, butter, eggs, water, coffee, sugar, and soft drinks.

Bernarda lives in the neighborhood of Las Brisas de Nacaome.  She is a rather quiet person who does not like to talk much, and is also very responsible.  She will use the loan to buy more merchandise and water to stock her grocery store.  Her desire is that her entire family have good health.

loans.use: To buy water, eggs, butter, churros, coffee, sugar, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.es:
Candelaria de 41 años de edad es soltera, trabaja para como Auxiliar de Enfermeria en el Hospital Asuncion desde hace varios años. Es madre soltera de 2 hijos: el mayor de nombre Oscar que estudia en la universidad y trabaja y le apoya a su mamá con los gastos de la casa y Yubelki de 11 años en primaria.

 Esta solicitando  su 7mo credito con el objetivo de construir un porche en su casa, ya que su casita fue construida por medio de un proyecto con Caritas y con las lluvias se le moja la pared de enfrente y desea protegerla con esta construccion para que tenga mas vida util.

 Candelaria expresa sentirse muy agradecida con AFODENIC y Kiva ya que con el credito anterior logro terminar su sueño de tener su casa propia, ya que logro instalar los servicios basicos (agua y luz) y construir su cocina para poder habitar su casita junto a sus hijos. Sin embargo, aun le falta acondicionarla, pero espera poco a poco hacerlo con el apoyo de AFODENIC y Kiva.
texts.en:
Candelaria is 41 years old, single, and has been working as a nursing assistant in Asunción Hospital for several years.  She is a single mother of 2 children: the eldest, Oscar, attends college and works, and he also supports his mother with household expenses, Yubelki, is 11 years old and in elementary school.

Candelaria is requesting her seventh loan with the goal of building a porch in her home.  Her house was built by a project with Caritas but the rain has wet the front wall, so she wants to protect her house with a porch to prolong its lifespan.

Candelaria is very grateful to AFODENIC and Kiva since her previous loan allowed her to complete her dream of having her own home.  She was able to install basic services (water and electricity), build her own kitchen, and live in her own house with her children.  Even though the house lacks protection, she hopes to gradually accomplish this with the help of AFODENIC and Kiva.

loans.use: Build a porch.

loans.name: Santo Milagro

texts.es:
la señora Santo Milagro A. tiene 42 años de edad, esta casada y vive en la aldea el Sope del municipio de Amapala. la Sra. Santo se dedica a la pezca.
el credito lo utilizara  para la compra de un trasmayo para pescar. 
Santo se dedica la venta de mariscos dentro y fuera de esta ciudad.
necesita comprar esa red porque la que tiene ya esta en mal estado y no esta sacando muchos mariscos del mar y esto le ocacione perdidas en tiempo y dinero.
texts.en: Señora Santo Milagro A. is 42 years old.   She is married and lives in the El Sope community in the town of Amapala.  Señora Santo fishes for a living.  She will use the loan to buy a trammel net for fishing.  Santo sells seafood in the city and the surrounding areas.  She needs to buy this net because hers is in bad shape and it is not catching many fish or shellfish.  This is causing her to lose time and money.

loans.use: To purchase a trammel net to catch fish and shellfish

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Jaqueline Esmilda

texts.es: La señora Jaqueline tiene 42 años, es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. La señora tiene en su casa una pulpería ella  vende leña, frijoles cocidos, frutas, golosinas, detergentes y granos básicos. Tiene 15 años de tener este negocio, el cual como una alternativa de fuente de ingreso, esto con el objetivo de brindar manutención a sus hijos. Ella desea este crédito con el objetivo de realizar compras variadas de sus productos, ya que quiere mejorar sus ganancias. Además, aduce la señora, cada día los precios de los productos están cada día más caros. Este se ha convertido en un desafió para ella, debido a que la situación económica del país cada día está más difícil. Ella sueña con seguir adelante en su negocio, tratando siempre de que sus hijos estudien y se preparen.
texts.en:
Señora Jaqueline is 42 years old.  She is a single mother with  2 young children.  She runs a store out of her house where she sells wood, cooked beans, fruits, candy, detergents and basic grains.  She has been running this business for 15 years.  It serves as an alternative source of income and supports her family.  

She will use the loan to buy various products as she wants to increase her earnings.  In additions, she says that every day the products are more and more expensive.  This has been a challenge for her as the economic situation in her country becomes more difficult every day. She dreams of  continuing with her business and making sure that her children go to school and prepare themselves for the future.

loans.use: To invest in various products for her store.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.en:
Isabel is part of the communal bank “Luz de Esperanza” (The Light for Hope), and lives in the city of Concepción.  Isabel is a cobbler, which involves sewing shoes with a special shoe machine. Isabel has spent the last 20 years perfecting this craft. At first, Isabel worked in a factory where she learned the craft, but for the past eight years Isabel has worked independently from Monday to Saturday in her house.
 
Isabel uses a borrowed machine as her machine was lost during the earthquake of February 27, 2010, which also caused havoc to her home which was assessed by the government as uninhabitable.  Despite this, Isabel, her husband and two children (aged 18 and 16 years-old) still live in the house, occupying only a single room, as they have no other place to go.  The Chilean government has identified Isabel’s families need for a house and through emergency fund programs will provide them a dwelling in approximately the next two years. 

Isabel dreams of owning a shoe repair shop. With this loan Isabel intends to purchase the shoe repair machine needed and return the one she has borrowed.  At this point Isabel’s earnings are the only source of income for the family.  

Isabel has enjoyed working with Fondo Esperanza, as the entrepreneurial training provided on business management is helpful.  Also, Isabel enjoys the companionship of her group, as meeting with them and her loan officer are her only distractions. 

Concepción is located at the mouth of the Biobio River, one of the country's largest rivers, in southern Chile's Biobio region. This is a historically important area, as it was the site of some important battles and settlements, especially during the War of Arauco, as it borders with Mapuche territory. The city is currently witnessing important economic and demographic development, and is considered to be one of the most important urban, administrative, financial and commercial nuclei of Chile, after Santiago and Valparaiso.

loans.use: To purchase a sewing machine for shoes.

loans.name: Cristina Isabel

texts.es:
la señora Cristina Isabel S. tiene 57 años de edad, esta casada con el señor Juan Antonio Alvarez Ponce, ambos de nacionalidad hondureña y con residencia en la aldea de el Coyolito, municipio de amapala, departamento de Valle.
la señora Cristina se dedica al comercio tiene un comedor en el cual vende almuerzos, cenas y golosinas.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de materiales para preparar sus alimentos.
las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con su familia y cubrir con los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Mrs. Cristina Isabel S. is 57 and married to Mr. Juan Antonio Alvarez Ponce. They are both Honduran and live in the village of el Coyolito, Amapala municipal district in Valle Department.
Cristina has a dining area where she sells lunches, suppers and sweets.
She will use the loan to buy ingredients to make the food.  She needs the earnings so that her family can get ahead and to cover household expenses.

loans.use: To buy shortening, fish, oil, vegetables, condiments, salt, tortillas, soft drinks, water and juices.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.es: El señor Reynaldo tiene 51 años, es casado y tiene 3 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. El señor se dedica a brindar el servicio de transporte, tiene 6 años de tener este negocio por lo que no ha sido fácil, pues el combustible está muy caro. Esta actividad nació con fondos propios y con mucho esfuerzo y entusiasmo. Don Reynaldo ha continuado con este negocio debido a la necesidad de generar ingresos para mantener a su familia, además que es un negocio bastante rentable. El señor solicita este crédito con el propósito de comprar llantas para su automóvil entre otras cosas. Su sueño es brindar un mejor servicio y de esta manera, mejorar la casa en que habita.
texts.en: Señor Reynaldo is 51 years old. He is married and is responsible for three minor children. His work is offering transportation services. He has been in this business for 6 years, and it has not been easy, since the fuel is very expensive. He began this business with his own money and with great effort and enthusiasm. Don Reynaldo has continued with this business due to the need to generate income to support his family. In addition, it is a fairly profitable business. He is applying for this loan with the intention of buying tires for his automobile, among other things. His dream is to offer a better service and in this way to improve the house where he lives.

loans.use: Buy tires for his taxi.

loans.name: Maria Santos

texts.es:
la señora Maria Santos M. A. tiene 47 años de edad, esta casada con el señor Jose del Carmen Aguilera Cabrera, Maria se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo popular, tiene una pequeña pulperia que esta ubicada en su casa de habitacion, el credito lo va a utilizar para comprar mas mercaderia y asi tener mas surtida su pulperia.
Maria vive en la aldea el Jocote a media cuadra de la iglesia remanente de Jesus.
su anhelo es terminar su casa.
las ganancias las necesita para cubrir con los gastos del hogar y para salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Señora Maria Santos M. A. is 47 years old. She is married to Señor Jose del Carmen Aguilera Cabrera. Maria sells popular consumer products. She has a little general store that is located in her home. She is going to use the loan to buy more merchandise so that her store will be better-stocked.

Maria lives in the village of Jocote, half a block from the Remanente de Jesus church. Her dream is to finish building her house. She needs the income from her store to cover household expenses and to advance her family.

loans.use: Buy soft drinks, juices, water, soap, candles, matches, sauces, pastas, beans, flour, rice, sugar, and toilet paper to stock her store

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es: El señor Wilfredo  tiene la edad de 45 años vive en la zona de Puerto Rico Barrio San Andres hace 8 años el señor oriundo de  Torrecillas  tiene como Actividad contratista albañil hace 15 años actualmente trabaja en el torno zona barrio Miraflores  su  estado civil concubino hace 20 años con su Sra. esposa Modesta  de edad 34 años que se dedica al servicio de ama de casa los señores cuentan actualmente con 6 hijos a su cargo 3 que se encuentran en el colegio  y 1 en la universidad y 2 que trabajan juntamente con su padre ayudándole ya que tiene un trabajo duro y sacrificado, pero sigue adelante por el bienestar de sus hijos,  Al mismo tiempos ellos están agradecidos con nuestra entidad por apoyarlos y depositarles la confianza para adquirir su crédito. El la foto el Sr. Wilfredo esta acompañada de su esposa.
texts.en: Señor Wilfredo is 45 years old. He has lived in the Puerto Rico zone and the San Andres neighborhood for 8 years, but he is a native of Torrecillas. He  is a mason and has worked as a contractor for 15 years. Now he works near the Miraflores neighborhood. He has had a common law marriage for 20 years with his wife Modesta, who is a housewife. They have 6 children, and are still responsible for 3 who are in school. One is at the university and two work together with their father, helping him, since he has a hard job and has sacrificed, but he continues to work for the well-being of his children. At the same time, they are thankful to Emprender for supporting them and entrusting them with the confidence to acquire their loan. In the photo, Sr. Wilfredo is accompanied by his wife.

loans.use: Buy material to construct latrines.

loans.name: Santos Felipe

texts.es:
Santos Felipe es un hombre de 43 años, la necesidad lo ha impulsado a obtener su propio negocio que es la venta de pollo hace mas de 6 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que es una persona muy responsable. 
Este es su primer Financiamiento con Fundación planea comprar una gran variedad de pollo está necesitando de este capital de trabajo adicional para responderles a sus clientes que le solicitan variedad. El buen carisma que ofrece es lo que hace que obtenga más clientes y un mercado mejor segmentado. Su sueño es mantener a su negocio, para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Santos Felipe is a 43 year old man. He saw a need to start his own business. He has been selling chicken for the past 6 years. He is a very responsible person. This is the first loan he accesses from Fundacion (Kiva Field Partner) and he plans on purchasing a selection of chicken meat that is in demand. He requires this source of capital funds to fill client demand for variety. His wonderful charisma attracts more clients in various sectors of the market. His dream is to keep up his business and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Benita

texts.es: La Sra. Benita, es una cliente que se dedica a la venta de sombreros, mantas y joyas para señoras de pollera, compra al por mayor de los artesanos que se dedican a la elaboracion de los sombreros y de las mantas, es cliente antigua de la institucion, tiene cuatro hijos varones, quienes ya trabajan independientemente, ella por ahora se encuetra dedicada a la crianza de su pequeño nieto de un año, quien quedo huérfano de madre, es una persona muy trabajadora, ya que desde que se separo del esposo ella controla a sus hijos, quienes trabajan en las movilidades que les dejó el papá y la que compraron con el trabajo de la mamá y de ellos, en fin ella es una persona muy responsable y puntual en sus pagos, con el dinero del  credito comprara mantas al por mayor ya que le hicieron muchos pedidos, esta muy agradecida con la institucion por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Benita is a member that sells hats, shawls and jewelry to women in the village. She makes her purchases in wholesale from the artesans that make the hats and shawls. She is a long-time member of the organization. She has 4 sons and they are all working and are independent. But in her care she now has a 1-year old grandson whose mother passed away. She is a very hardworking woman and ever since she separated from her husband she has supported her children. They work in the businesses that their father left them and they use the facilities that she bought them. She is a very responsible person and she is timely with her payments. With the funds from this loan she will purchase shawls in wholesale. She has had a large number of orders placed. She is very grateful to the organization for the support she has received.

loans.use: To purchase shawls in wholesale.

loans.name: Franz

texts.es:
El joven FRANZ B. P. es conyugue de la señorita GABRIELA CAILLOMA FLORES, desde hace dos años ellos viven el Barrio Piraicito de la Zona del Plan 3000. Tienen un hijo de 3 años, viven en la casa de los Padres del señor B., 

El se dedica a la Fabricación de Carritos Metálicos  que son de hierro y los hace trabajar en los parques de diversiones, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 3 años el trabaja en el taller de su padre que es por la zona del Mechero de la ciudad de SANTA CRUZ

El necesita del préstamo para mejorar sus ingresos comprándose sus propias herramientas con las cuales pueda ser independiente y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida
texts.en:
The young Franz B. P. lives with his girlfriend Gabriela Cailloma Flores. And for the past two years tehy have lived in the district of Patricio in the Plan 3000 region. They have a 3 year old son together and they live with Mr. B.'s parents.

He makes carousel cars for midway rides in the parks. He has had this business for the past 3 years. He works in his father's shop located in Mechero, in the city of Santa Cruz.

He requires a loan to improve his income, to purchase his own set of tools. He will used those to make himself independent and improve the quality of their life.

loans.use: To purchase hardware tools.

loans.name: Pascual

texts.es: El Sr. Pascual  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz en la localidad de San Carlos tiene 2 hijos el es soltero el es de Cochabamba hace 12 años que se vino de Cochabamba por que allá no se podía progresar pero tuvo la suerte de conseguir una parcela en villa San Carlos en la cual el se dedica a la agricultura juntamente con sus hijos quienes le ayudan a su Papa, pero trabajan medio día por que ellos estudian, el Sr. Es muy trabajador el dinero del crédito lo utilizara para el Chaqueo y la compra de semillas para plantar maiz, yuca y también cítricos, esta muy agradecido con Emprender y Kiva por la confianza brindada en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en: Mr. Pascual works in agriculture, growing corn in the area of San Carlos. He has 2 children and is single. He is from Cochabamba, where he came from 12 years ago because he couldn’t go forward there. He has been lucky enough to find a parcel of land in the village of San Carlos, where he, with the help of his children, works in agriculture. His children work half of the day while they are in school. Mr. Pascual is very hard-working, and the money from this loan will be used for the Chaqueo (a prevalent practice in Bolivia, where farmers burn grasslands used for cattle grazing to enrich and fertilize it). He will also use the loan to buy seeds to plant corn, yucca, and citrus. He is very thankful for Emprender and Kiva for the confidence they have in him.

loans.use: For the Chaqueo and to grow corn

loans.name: Noemi

texts.es: La Señora  Noemí, se dedica a la atención de su venta surtida, la cual vende lo que es abarrote, útiles escolares, venta de tarjetas, chip y también cosas de cosméticos y ropa interior, el cual hace que su venta quede muy pequeña en espacio, Es por eso que solicito un crédito con Emprender  para poder trasladarse a la construcción  de una tienda que falta terminar, Es una persona que es separada de su esposo hace mucho tiempo, tiene una hija que estudia, La Señora Noemí es una mujer emprendedora y con muchas ansias de superación en especial trabaja por el bienestar de su hija. Vive en la urbanización el Recreo.  Trabaja desde muy temprano, demuestra responsabilidad y Cumplimiento.
texts.en: Mrs. Noemí sells groceries, school supplies, cards, chips, cosmetics, and undergarments in her well-stocked stall. She sells all of these goods in a very small space. Because of this, she is requesting a loan with Emprender to continue construction on a store that is almost complete. She is away from her husband much of the time and has a daughter, who is in school. Mrs. Noemí is an enterprising woman with a desire to improve her life for the wellbeing of her daughter. She lives in the city of Recreo. She begins working very early, which shows her responsibility and achievement.

loans.use: To finish construction on a store

loans.name: Osvaldo

texts.es: El señor Osvaldo vive en el Barrio de la Urbanización El Terrado, el se dedica al servicio del transporte Urbano hace como cinco años, él necesita el crédito para la reparación del vehículo, ya que es su fuente de ingresos y debe cambiar algunas partes del motor. Tiene cuatro hijos que asisten a primaria, su esposa se dedica al servicio de la educación, es profesora en un colegio cerca de su casa, ambos tiene como meta conseguir el dinero que les falta para comenzar a construir su casa para ya no vivir en alquiler ya que no les alcanza el dinero para otros gastos que tienen, Ellos son personas responsables y muy carismáticas, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Osvaldo lives in the El Terrado urban neighborhood.  He has been a taxi driver for about five years.

He needs the loan to repair his vehicle because it’s his source of income and he has to replace some of the engine’s parts.

He has four children in elementary school and his wife is a teacher at a school near their house.  The goal of both of them is to acquire the money they still need to start building a house and stop renting because their money isn’t enough to cover other expenses they have.

They are responsible, very charismatic people.  He is very grateful to the institution for the support given.

loans.use: For vehicle repair.

loans.name: Moises

texts.es: El Sr. Moisés Vive en la localidad de el Torno distante a 39 km de la ciudad de Santa Cruz, en la casa de su hermana, tiene su lote de terreno donde piensa a construir su vivienda, su actividad es la de servicio de moto taxi urbano, el destino del crédito es para comprar ganado y venderlo en la feria. Su esposa se dedica a labores de la casa y en las noches estudia, hace diez año que se dedica a este negocio, es nacido en el departamento, y desde pequeño tuvo que trabajar para ayudar a sus padres de escaso recursos, es muy trabajador y un joven responsable, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Moisés lives in El Torno, 39 kilometers from the city of Santa Cruz, in his sister’s house.  He owns a lot where he plans to build his house.  

He is an urban mototaxi driver but the loan will be used to buy cattle for subsequent resale at the livestock fair.

His wife is a housewife and goes to school at night.  He has been in this business for ten years.  He was born in this department and has worked since he was a child to help his parents who were of few resources.

He is a very hard working, responsible young man.  He is very grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: To buy cattle.

loans.name: María Auxiliadora

texts.es:
En la parroquia Andrés De V. de la ciudad de  Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen  cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Virgen de Guadalupe.

Aquí conocimos a la señora María, ella tiene 56 años de edad, mantiene una unión libre de la cual tuvo 10 hijos pero dos de ellos fallecieron hace ya algún tiempo. Dos de sus hijos viven con ella en su casa. Su marido se dedica al comercio, vende legumbres en el mercado central de Portoviejo.

Ella tiene un pequeño restaurante en su casa, dice que cocina muy rico y por eso decidió hace dos años poner su negocio en el cual prepara de lunes a viernes desayunos y almuerzos, trabaja en estos días desde las 5 am hasta las 14h00 pero los sábados y domingos trabaja hasta las 19h00 ya que también prepara meriendas, estos dos días su hija le ayuda en su negocio, tiene muchos clientes que la prefieren ya que ella prepara su comida con la mejor sazón.

Este crédito lo va a ocupar en comprar más productos para la preparación de su comida y una parte para comprar unas ollas ya que las que tiene son muy pequeñas lo cual le dificulta su trabajo. Este es su segundo ciclo en el Banco Comunal y espera estar por mucho tiempo más.
 
Su sueño es tener un gran restaurante.
texts.en:
In the area of Andrés De V., in the city of Portoviejo, capital of Manabí which is known as the city of “Los Reales Tamarindos” (a stadium where football matches are held) every fifteen days the members of the Virgen de Guadalupe Communal Bank meet.

We met Mrs. María, she is 56 years old and has a common-law marriage where she had 10 children but two of them died some time ago. Two of her children live with her. Her husband sells vegetables in the Portoviejo central market.

María has a small restaurant in her home and says that she cooks very well and that is why two years ago she decided to have her own business making breakfast and lunches Monday through Friday from 5 a.m. until 2 p.m. but Saturdays and Sundays she works until 7 p.m. she also prepares diners. During the weekends her daughter helps her and she has many customers who prefer the food that she makes since it has better flavor.

This loan will be used to buy more products to make the food and to buy some pots since the ones that she has are too small and makes her work harder. This is her second loan with the communal bank and hopes to have more in the future.

María’s dream is to have a great restaurant.

loans.use: To buy groceries and pots.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: La Sra. Margarita Vive en la localidad de la Guardia distante a 20 km de la Ciudad de Santa Cruz, es nacida en el departamento de Cochabamba, hace uno 30 años que  vino al departamento de Santa Cruz, tiene un hijo a  su cargo, su esposo se dedica al transporte, su actividad es la venta de refrigerio ambulante como sándwich en la ramada (mercado muy conocido  de la ciudad) , el destino del crédito es para terminar de construir su casa, que esta en obra bruta y necesita comprar pintura mosaico, etc., esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Margarita lives in the village of La Guardia, located 20 km from the town of Santa Cruz. A native of the Cochabamba department, she moved to the Santa Cruz department around 30 years ago. She has a child who depends economically on her, her husband engages in transportation and she is a street vendor selling snacks such as sandwiches in La Ramada (a very well-known market in town). The loan she is requesting will be used to finish building her house: as the initial works have been completed, she now needs to buy paint, tessellated pavement and so on. She is really thankful to this institution for the support provided.

loans.use: To finish building her house.

loans.name: Gema Liceth

texts.es:
En la parroquia Andrés De Vera de la ciudad de  Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen  cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Virgen de Guadalupe.

Para la señora Gema este es su segundo ciclo en el Banco Comunal, es socia fundadora y además es la tesorera del Banco, responsabilidad que cumple muy a gusto ya que sabe que esto es por el bien del grupo. Tiene 20 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un precioso niño de un año, está estudiando el tercer semestre de enfermería en la Universidad.

Ella y su esposo se dedican a la venta de pescado en el mercado de la ciudad Portoviejo, ellos venden al por mayor a los comerciantes que venden al menudeo (por libra) aunque a veces también venden por piezas a los clientes. El Trabaja todos los días desde las 2am ya que tiene que trasladarse a Manta a comprar el pescado, luego lo trae a Portoviejo donde ella lo ayuda en la  entrega. Sus labores terminan  a las 15h00,  de allí ella se va a su casa a prepararse para ir a sus estudios.

 Este crédito es justamente para invertirlo en comprar pescado.
 
Su sueño es terminar su carrera y ejercerla.
texts.en:
In the area of Andrés De Vera, in the city of Portoviejo, capital of Manabí which is known as the city of “Los Reales Tamarindos” (a stadium where football matches are held), every fifteen days the members of the Virgen de Guadalupe Communal Bank meet.

This would be Mrs. Gema’s second loan in the Communal Bank, she is a founding member and is the treasurer for the Bank which is a responsibility that she enjoys very much since she knows it’s good for her group. Gema is 20 years old and lives in a common law marriage where she has a beautiful one year old little boy. Gema is her third semester in nursing school at the University.

Gema and her husband sell fish in the market of the city of Portoviejo. They sell their fish wholesale to merchants that sell retail (per pound) although sometimes they also sell fish to customers. Her husband works everyday from 2 a.m. since he has to go to Manta to buy the fish, then he brings it to Portoviejo where Gema helps him deliver it. Their work ends at 3 p.m. and Gema goes home to get ready to go to school.

This loan is to buy fish.

Gema’s dream is to finish her degree and practice her profession.

loans.use: To buy fish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Inventory

loans.name: Cascabeles Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Cascabeles, se llaman así por que se llevan bien y a varias de ellas le gustan las víboras. Está ubicado en México a un lugar donde se caracteriza por la hacienda La Purísima que es de descanso para los que la visitan y es una fuente de trabajo para algunos habitantes de la comunidad.  El grupo está conformado por  10 integrantes.

 Una de las integrantes del grupo se llama Socorro Irene L.. Tiene 53 años estudió hasta la preparatoria, comenta que sus estudios le ayudaron para tener un trabajo y así ayudar a sus papas en los gastos de su casa, al momento de casarse fue de gran ayuda su trabajo para salir adelante  pero después del tiempo se tuvo que salir de trabajar, sinembargo no se quiso quedar con las manos cruzadas y se dedicó a la venta de postres, frituras, gelatinas y chicharrones para mantener a su familia y solventar cada una de sus necesidades. Socorro vende actualmente chicharrones y postres, generalmente los chicharrones los vende fuera de la escuela que queda a un lago de su casa, y los postres los vende por pedidos que le encargan sus propios vecinos, gente que ya la conoce y a veces por recomendación, sueña con un local que le permita tener mejores ventas y tener éxito en su giro
texts.en:
This group is named Cascabeles (rattles/bells), because they all get along well and several of them like rattlesnakes. It is located in Mexico, in a place that is characterized by the ranch, La Purisima, which is the rest place for those that visit and a source of work for a few inhabitants of the community. The group is made up of 10 members.

One of the group members is named Socorro Irene L.. She is 53 years old and studied up to the pre-college level. She tells us that her studies helped her get a job and thereby helped her parents pay their expenses. Up until the time when she got married, her job was a great help for her to get ahead, but after awhile she had to leave it.
